display_long_description:
# **UPDATE: You can control your iPhone 📱 in VR using the Spatial Phone app!**

Finally figured out a way to control your iPhone in VR on your Meta Quest —  something that was previously only possible on Android.
 [media]

You can mirror and control your iPhone/Android phone directly onto your Meta Quest with high-quality passthrough and low latency. Use it in any app or game.

Note : iPhone needs to be paired with your Meta Quest each time you want to use the control feature. This is a limitation of the current technology and may be resolved in the future.

# Features:

**🔹 High-Resolution Passthrough**
[media]
Enjoy crystal-clear visuals of your Android/iOS device inside your Meta Quest headset with very low latency and stereo audio (40ms-90ms)

**🔹 Can be used with other apps/games**
[media]
 This app can be used in background with other app/games

**🔹 Control with Meta Quest Controllers**
[media]

**🔹 Easy to connect and private peer-to-peer connection**
[media]
Connect on the same network or internet without any custom setting. Your data stays private with end-to-end peer-to-peer connections. No additional data is collected or stored.



For additional help you can reach out on discord :  https://discord.gg/99qgmSxUZ9


[media]
Requirements : iPhone or Android 8+ are currently supported.

The companion software is free to download.

# **UPDATE: You can control your iPhone 📱 in VR using the Spatial Phone app!**

Finally figured out a way to control your iPhone in VR on your Meta Quest —  something that was previously only possible on Android.
 ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491825305_713821748209256_1811666983523177845_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Rbzpi62HyTgQ7kNvwE4Wr_U&_nc_oc=AdneP8B-OWi_E2K_uGns3GWClQrsdP0voRBkNWTUNuDyHbkpPSb6NcsCABAwBotFRx0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=0V2Xdp7rZg3dwOr34iXJkQ&oh=00_AfpOIvjDJ3jIQXjkW4ZM4GEfae0OVNcUbGAxANESKGwdjg&oe=695DD31F)

You can mirror and control your iPhone/Android phone directly onto your Meta Quest with high-quality passthrough and low latency. Use it in any app or game.

Note : iPhone needs to be paired with your Meta Quest each time you want to use the control feature. This is a limitation of the current technology and may be resolved in the future.

# Features:

**🔹 High-Resolution Passthrough**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/491819281_1416266746061693_1950535190430581396_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=u_cTVwiVcjsQ7kNvwHxCLQD&_nc_oc=Adl-lPB30Y3YDXo5Xi4GTDb_8r3wJGFfj-PaAvzbN4fyoD6d1rwtADjV4kysm1Nnnzs&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfoEDlAC7ZxPslQC-D0AI0WBIz2TJX3Kp6eLSB2SoLj-uA&oe=695DC954)
Enjoy crystal-clear visuals of your Android/iOS device inside your Meta Quest headset with very low latency and stereo audio (40ms-90ms)

**🔹 Can be used with other apps/games**
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822558_1485561759489852_7463739102511266467_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=j88XOoFeUCAQ7kNvwGtW76o&_nc_oc=Adn-lSLjMQ-RrH9S1TR_S4d1oSVpzfkF_TY0RpoijKb4dSO8BPGrRfbeBdkuuLQKln0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=0V2Xdp7rZg3dwOr34iXJkQ&oh=00_Afpv-Czup5FIuUroIYyJMR_TeCfSyYblSlGLqdOodjtGRQ&oe=695DB201)
 This app can be used in background with other app/games

**🔹 Control with Meta Quest Controllers**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/499295509_1469651344483231_5722649313226420511_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=Bvn_oop2Ns0Q7kNvwFFkgeC&_nc_oc=AdlqnNskT_8ffvKnlewwz1ZaTW3LaUYrWHMKtrSO6943AtEmKaFMMH29LX-GcAkRTHM&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfpoSpg1ySRZPMvQ_akMLB5lIWV86rZ3uvE4h1vDm_UjZA&oe=695DD19C)

**🔹 Easy to connect and private peer-to-peer connection**
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/499294745_705784255648705_5777747854196816471_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=sian6-e4reEQ7kNvwGYnfPG&_nc_oc=AdncRFel9XsT7KlQ4ZGyoYh26_19nfs8-YCtUHMUt8_Z51ZHt47TaMKKyP_Md9enKP0&_nc_zt=3&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AfpAprfdFDOKlGfBHdmqaDuuPhAarr1XJGd72Q_IT0_V4w&oe=695DA2F1)
Connect on the same network or internet without any custom setting. Your data stays private with end-to-end peer-to-peer connections. No additional data is collected or stored.



For additional help you can reach out on discord :  https://discord.gg/99qgmSxUZ9

Requirements : iPhone or Android 8+ are currently supported.

The companion software is free to download.
